= Current Project Status of HBase-Writer =

Currently HBase-Writer has 2 active branches (to match the hadoop hbase project)

* /trunk

Development to be compatible with hadoop-0.19.X and hbase-0.19.X

* /branches/0.18

supports hadoop-0.18.X and hbase-0.18.X


All branches work with Heritrix 2.0.X.
